'''''Encyclopedia of Natural Philosophy''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to access [[The Narzissenkreuz Ordo]] from within the [[Institute of Natural Philosophy]].
